name: whigi
description: A way for users to regain control over their data
author: whigi-team

scripts.serve: cp --force nginx.conf /etc/nginx/sites-available/whigi && rm -f /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/whigi && ln -s /etc/nginx/sites-available/whigi /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/whigi && service nginx restart
scripts.serve-giveaway: cp --force whigi-giveaway/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/sites-available/whigi-giveaway && rm -f /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/whigi-giveaway && ln -s /etc/nginx/sites-available/whigi-giveaway /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/whigi-giveaway && service nginx restart
scripts.whigi: node whigi/index.js 8080 whigi2-demo.envict.com whigi2-restore.envict.com whigi.com@gmail.com false false /root/Whigi
scripts.whigi-dev: node whigi/index.js 443 whigi2-demo.envict.com whigi2-restore.envict.com whigi.com@gmail.com true true /root/Whigi
scripts.whigi-restore: node whigi-restore/index.js 8081 whigi2-restore.envict.com whigi2-demo.envict.com whigi.com@gmail.com false false
scripts.whigi-restore-dev: node whigi-restore/index.js 444 whigi2-restore.envict.com whigi2-demo.envict.com whigi.com@gmail.com true true
scripts.whigi-cc: node whigi-cc/index.js 443 whigi2-cc.envict.com true domain198.12.12.12 whigi2-cc.general.com
scripts.build_whigi_data: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments whigi/data.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_whigi_user: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments whigi/user.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_whigi-restore_mapping: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments whigi-restore/mapping.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_whigi-giveaway_mapping: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments whigi-giveaway/mapping.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_whigi-rli_mapping: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments whigi-rli/mapping.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_whigi-cc_mapping: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments whigi-cc/mapping.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_utils_checks: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments utils/checks.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_utils_utils: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments utils/utils.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build_tests_fakeres: node_modules/.bin/tsc --removeComments tests/backend/FakeRes.ts && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.build: npm run build_whigi_data && npm run build_whigi_user && npm run build_whigi-restore_mapping && npm run build_whigi-giveaway_mapping && npm run build_whigi-rli_mapping && npm run build_whigi-cc_mapping && npm run build_utils_checks && npm run build_utils_utils && npm run build_tests_fakeres
